local_intent: Secure the dishwasher handle by closing the gripper after fine alignment and wrist yaw, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: Dishwasher handle is visible and reachable; slight forward advance along handle axis is safe.
coherence_with_global: Matches global plan: align to handle, set yaw=90, advance slightly (MoveDelta x=0.05), close gripper with force=20, then confirm grasp before opening the hinged door.
